data.name: Domain_InvalidHyphen
data.value: Organization identifier cannot start or end with a hyphen.

data.name: Domain_InvalidCharacters
data.value: Organization identifier can only contain letters, numbers.

data.name: FirstName_Length
data.value: First name must be between 2 and 255 characters.

data.name: LastName_Length
data.value: Last name must be between 2 and 255 characters.

data.name: PhoneNumber_InvalidFormat
data.value: Phone number must follow Iranian format.

data.name: Password_MinLength
data.value: Password must be at least 8 characters long.

data.name: Validation_TokenInvalid
data.value: Refresh/Token is not provided pleas login

data.name: FatherName_Length
data.value: Father's name must be between 2 and 255 characters.

data.name: NationalCode_Numeric
data.value: National code must contain only numbers.
